msbt.message: Hey, did you know that the sprouts and seeds ol' Leif brings with him aren't sold in normal stores? Yeah, sometimes that fella seems like he's three tulips shy of a flower bedBut one look at all that rare stuff he's sellin', and ya know he's usin' the premium mulch.

Did you know that shrubs, unlike normal ol' trees, won't wither if you plant 'em next to each other? No sirree! They grow up real nice side by side.Weird as it sounds, you might say they actually like each other's company, .

Nature Day is all about gettin' folks to see how important nature and flowers and stuff like that are. I mean, how'd it be if we didn't have flowers and trees and whatnot? Not good, that's how it'd be! Sheesh. Makes ya think maybe every day should be Nature Day, .

Here's a funny story for ya. This one time, I was growin' all my flowers together in one spot, like ya do Then one day, a color I'd never seen before bloomed right there in the middle of 'em! Just popped right up! I tell ya, just when you think you've got Mother Nature figured out, she throws something crazy at ya. Like funny flowersor man-faced stink bugs. Ever seen one of them? It's a BUG with a FACE on its back! Like I said, nature is nuts. But it sure does keep ya on your toes, !

I want ya to let me know if you have any ideas about how to improve this island's natural environment. Big ideas. Small ideas. Good ideas. Not-so-good ideas. I want to hear any ideas about how to help nature. See, I'm gonna put all the ideas in a big ol' list, and then I'm gonna tackle 'em one by one, . I don't care what anyone says. THAT is how you become an environmentaLIST!
